title: Life in the balance
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cardiac resuscitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Heart
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medical care

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Coronary disease
description: Demonstrates the principals and practices of cardiopulmonary resuscitation within the coronary care unit. Shows how a coronary care unit can provide for the prevention, detection and treatment of serious arrhythmias, cardiogenic shock and cardiac arrest.
